feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: BADI Recommendation for Vendor Balance Validation in FB65 in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have a business requirement where users should be allowed to post an FB65 transaction (Create Incoming Invoice) only if the vendor has a NIL or debit balance (that is, the vendor balance must be greater than or equal to zero).

Could you please advise which BADI can be used to implement this validation

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: Request for Guidance on Regenerating Payment Advice in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear team,

In the SAP Public Cloud, the payment advice is generated during the automatic payment run (F110). However, as business users update the UTR number and reference details in subsequent steps, these fields are not available at the time of payment advice generation.

Could you please advise on a possible approach or workaround to regenerate the payment advice in SAP Public Cloud to reflect the updated UTR and reference information.

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: BADi MRM_CHECK_INVOICE_CLOUD - can't find Transaction attribute
entry.content:
Dear experts, I have to make sure that supplier invoice, debit and credit memo is posted with a specific FI Document type.

For this I expected to cross check invoice's Transaction ("Invoice" | "Credit memo" | "Subsequent debit" | "Subsequent credit") against FI Document type. In the BADi I cannot find attribute Transaction - please advise.

Kindest regards,

Victor

@Zhehui_Xia28

Product and Topic Expert

entry.title: Adaptation Project for Post Outgoing Payment (F1612)
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'm working on an adaptation project for the "Post Outgoing Payments" (F1612) Fiori app. The adaptation project works fine in Preview and in the Adaptation Editor, but after deployment, launching the app shows a blank page.

Here’s the error shown in the browser console:
Uncaught (in promise) Unknown consumer of clearing library: <my namespace>
I haven’t made any modifications—just created the adaptation project and deployed it as-is. I expected it to load like the default app, but instead, I’m getting this blank screen.

For context, I'm using VS Code and have tried both the @SAP-ux/generator-adp and @SAP/generator-adaptation-project to generate the project. The result is the same in both cases.

Has anyone experienced something similar? Is there a workaround or specific configuration required to enable adaptation for this app?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Inquiry on Custom Logic in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP experts,

I would like to understand whether it is possible to implement custom logic or custom code within an SAP Public Cloud implementation.

Thank you for your guidance.

Best regards,

Gopal Sahu

entry.title: MIRO 自定义字段 F4 未生效
entry.content:
1、MIRO 的 GUI 界面中自定义字段的 F4 选中后没有生效

entry.title: Plan & Budget import financial data in Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear All,

I would like to import the WBS plan and budget into the system on an annual basis. Plan Category Type: PLN and BUDGET01
If data for the previous year has already been imported, and I would like to import only the Plan and Budget for the current year, after importing only the current year data, the Plan and Budget entries for the previous year disappear. How can we prevent the data from the previous year from disappearing?

Best regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Upload of supplement and transfer budget in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear all,

I would like to enter additional budgets with monthly budget control. Currently, in the Supplement Budget entry screen, the system allows creating a budget for only one month per entry. Is there a screen or functionality that allows inputting budgets for multiple posting dates simultaneously?

Regards,

Keratiya D.

Thank you.

entry.title: 如何通过自定义逻辑来限制供应商发票的多次暂存
entry.content: loop at ITEMSWITHPOREFERENCE REFERENCE INTO DATA(Supinvoice_item). if action = if_ex_mrm_check_invoice_cloud=>c_Action_Hold. if Supinvoice_item->ISFINALLYINVOICED IS NOT INITIAL. select single * from I_SuplrInvcItemPurOrdRefAPI01 with privileged access where referenceDocument = @Supinvoice_item->referenceDocument and referenceDocumentItem = @Supinvoice_item->referenceDocumentItem into @DATA(Is_Supinvoice) . if Is_Supinvoice-ISFINALLYINVOICED = 'D' . append value #( messagetype = 'E' messageid = 'MRM_BADI_CLOUD' messagenumber = '001' messagevariable1 = '暂存的发票有重复项目。' ) to messages. endif. endif. endif. endloop.

entry.title: Form processing - S/4HANA Public Cloud

Perhaps some of you have already had experience with this or can provide me with links to instructions or tips?

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: BADI to pick user name from the user ID in COUNT_LIST output form
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to display the username in the PI count output format rather than the username which is given in the standard form. We have created a custom field, assigned it to the custom layout and tried using the BADI- INV10_LIST_OF_STOCKS_FORM_I. However, we are unable to get the username.

Please advise.

Thanks,

Ruwani

entry.title: Error in calling Outbound Delivery public API in iflow in integration suite
entry.content:
I have created a simple iflow where odata public API API_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV;v=0002 is called in odata v2 receiver adapter to fetch Outbound delivery details from SAP S4 HANA public cloud system. I am able to get Outbound Delivery number using GET call. Now, to fetch item details, in resource path, i selected sub level as 1 and then selected item number field in 'to_DeliveryDocumentItem' sub-level.
Below is the query that is getting generated
$select=DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocumentItem&$expand=to_DeliveryDocumentItem&$filter=DeliveryDocument eq '80000000'

No payload is passed to this iflow.

I am getting below error when iflow is triggered through postman
com.sap.it.rt.adapter.http.api.exception.HttpResponseException: An internal server error occured: An exception of type 'WstxUnexpectedCharException' occurred.. cause:com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxUnexpectedCharException: Unexpected character '&' (code 38) (expected a name start character) at [row, col{unknown source}]: [1,182].  The MPL ID for the failed message is : AGiSChZ7DkZ-t0vCX2lUJ7YK8I9d

Kindly help in resolving this issue

entry.title: How to add calculation field and code in Custom CDS view
entry.content:

We need to add calculation field in Custom CDS view, could you please guide us how to write the code?

For example, if the Debit/credit code = "H", then the quantity = Quantity * (-1). 

Is there any document to explain the coding for Custom CDS view? Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Extending the functionality of eDocument for a non-localized country CE2508
entry.content:
To extend the functionality of eDocument for a non-localized country, ABAP-level extensions and configurations in SAP Cloud Public have been implemented. However, despite following the step-by-step instructions provided in the SAP Learning course Applying Localization as a Self-Service for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, the Financial Document is not visible in the eDocument Cockpit

An error occurs in the class CL_EDOCUMENT_EXT~CONSTRUCTOR.

 IF lv_abap_langu_version = if_abap_language_version=>gc_version-sap_cloud_platform. "eDocument Country/Region class

 CREATE OBJECT mo_edocument_ext_country TYPE (lv_class_name).

TRY.  "CE2508

lo_edocument_ext_es ?= mo_edocument_ext_country. "CE2508

Where the variable lv_class_name = zcl_drc_edocument, and this class has already been implemented.

 What could be missing?

entry.title: Manage software collection which is exported by mistake with all items
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team,

User has exported software collection version with all items in it by mistake and got imported to Test system. This version has many items created by different users.

Only single item which consists in this software collection need to be moved to Production now and other items are not to be moved to production.

Please let us know how to manage this situation.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Workflow condition for Purchase Order – How to read Plant at creation time in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Everyone.

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and have created a custom workflow for Purchase Orders in Manage Workflows for Purchase Orders.
The workflow has 2 steps and should be triggered only if the Plant = 1000.

I am implementing the BAdI SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF to define and evaluate a custom start condition.
In the EVALUATE_CONDITION method, I can easily check the Plant for an already saved PO using i_purchaseorderitemapi01.
Example:

SELECT * FROM i_purchaseorderitemapi01 WHERE purchaseorder = @IS_sap_object_node_type-sont_key_part_1 INTO TABLE @LT_items.

Problem:
When the PO is being created for the first time (in draft mode),

  • is_sap_object_node_type-sont_key_part_1 is empty (no PO number yet).

  • There is no CDS view like i_purchaseorderitemapidraft to read the plant directly.

  • So I cannot determine the plant at creation time to set cv_is_true for triggering the workflow.

Question:

  • How can I get the Plant information for a PO at the time of creation (before it has a PO number) inside SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

  • Is there a draft table or API available for reading the data?


I found some other custom logic where I am getting plant data, but there I have no changing parameter which evaluates Workflow triggering condition. 

I found below 2 business context BADI definition & Implementation feasible for Workflow triggering.

SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF => Condition Definition
SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_EVAL => Business Logic Validation
Except these I found no other feasible business context custom logic for workflow triggering.

How to achieve the above requirement
SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: How Can We Consume Standard APIs With Business Users in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
I'm currently working on an S/4HANA Public Cloud project and have a question regarding API consumption from a business user perspective.

I’m already familiar with the technical setup — using communication users, communication arrangements, and communication systems to consume standard APIs.

However, my current need is different:
Is there a way for a business user (not a communication/technical user) to access or consume SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud standard APIs?

Ahmed Ansari

entry.title: Export Software Collection in a Public Cloud environment fails after upgrade
entry.content:
I need to export one change to an BRF+ Application to our TST environment. I chose the option "CHANGED AND DELETED ITEMS". Due to the recent upgrade of Public Cloud to 2508, all items will be exported  

The export ends in an error message without extra information. It says 'Export Failed' but there is no detail information about why it failed. There are no other errors or warnings in the log. 

 

I have also tried to create a hotfix for the specific BRF+ change that I need to transport, but this hotfix has the same export error. 

I have also tried to activate the BRF+ application as a whole (mass change) again and then try to release but this also doesn't help.

I checked in Eclipse and found the Transport that was created by SAP.  If found this transportlog that maybe indicates that the lock cannot be set by SAP or that a lock is still active. 

 

How can I solve this problem? Is there a log somewhere that I can't see? What could be the issue?

Regards,

Ben Meijs
